name: Untitled (itch) (Black Parable)
description:
"Everything begins Untitled..."

Untitled is a short narrative experience that experiments with a symbolic and ambiguous narrative, while attempting to demonstrate the pains of a long debated and controversial topic.

Controls

  • Look around -- (MOUSE)
  • Move -- (W,A,S,D) or (ARROW KEYS)
  • Run -- (LEFT SHIFT) or (RIGHT CONTROL)
  • Interact -- (E) or (LEFTCLICK)
  • Flash Light -- (F) or (MIDDLE MOUSE)
  • Zoom -- (Z) or (RIGHT CLICK)

Note from developer

Everything seen in-game was created with the sole intention to learn how to make a game start to finish. So a special thanks to every one who downloads and tries the game.
